goal: My friend and I are thinking of a ski trip to Whistler, BC. Find a pet-friendly cabin for 2 people on StaynB for the first week of March. Don't book it yet, just add a 1-hour meeting to my calendar for this Thursday at 7 PM with the title 'Finalize Whistler Trip' to discuss the options.

evals.description: Verify StaynB search filters were correctly applied for 2 guests, 'Pets allowed' amenity, and 'Cabin' property type.
